name: Orbit manpower
description: Orbit Global HR Consultants LLP is India's fast growing Consulting & Manpower Recruitment Company. At Orbit we offer recruitment services to IT industry & Non-IT Industry. enhanced_description: Orbit Global HR Consultants LLP is an India-based HR consulting and manpower recruitment company. Established in 2009, they specialize in providing permanent and temporary staffing solutions for both IT and Non-IT industries. The company offers a comprehensive range of recruitment services, focusing on analyzing clients' needs to source the best talent within specified timelines. Orbit is committed to building long-term relationships with both employers and job seekers, offering personalized guidance and support throughout the hiring process to make it smooth and efficient.
